OSI Modeli N…ôdir?

OSI (Open Systems Interconnection) modeli ≈ü…ôb…ôk…ô …ôlaq…ôl…ôrinin 7 t…ôb…ôq…ôd…ôn ibar…ôt konsepsiyasƒ±dƒ±r:

  1. Fiziki qat (Physical Layer)
  2. Data Link qat (Layer 2)
  3. ≈û…ôb…ôk…ô qat (Network Layer)
  4. N…ôqliyyat qat (Transport Layer)
  5. Sessiya qat (Session Layer)
  6. T…ôqdimat qat (Presentation Layer)
  7. T…ôtbiq qat (Application Layer)

H…ôr qat √∂z√ºn…ôm…ôxsus protokollar v…ô funksiyalar da≈üƒ±yƒ±r, buna g√∂r…ô d…ô h√ºcumlar qatlara g√∂r…ô d…ôyi≈üir.

1Ô∏è‚É£ Fiziki Qat H√ºcumlarƒ± (Layer 1)
